pages.description: We have access to a wide range of inventory and we are the only supplier in the country who has the most readily available stocks. Our staff is equipped with technical and mechanical expertise that earns them a formidable credibility and worldwide network within the international construction, mining, and exploration industry.

partners.name: AMC
partners.description: AMC is one of the world’s leading manufacturers of drilling fluids and equipment, offering a wide array of innovative products for mining, water well, drilling, and tunnelling operations.

partners.name: IMDEX
partners.description: Imdex Limited is a leading global mining equipment, technology and services (METS) company, offering solutions that simplify the process of identifying and extracting what is below the earth’s surface for drilling contractors and resource companies.

partners.name: REFLEX
partners.description: REFLEX is a global supplier of advanced subsurface intelligence solutions comprising advanced downhole instrumentation, data management and analytical software for geological modeling.
